resources.string:
Welcome in AA AIO Tweaker
 This app will let you apply some tweaks to Android Auto
 Simply select what tweak you want to apply :)
 If you are unsure of what a tweak does, long press on it and a tutorial will show up.

This app can alter Android Auto behaviour and bypass some safety features that Google has implemented in Android Auto.\n By using this software, you agree that YOU, and ONLY YOU, are solely responsible for any possible consequence that may result in altering safety features such as injury to yourself and/or others, property damage, loss of life.\n Under no circumnstances is the author of this app responsible for its use

Status Legend:
 GREEN= Patch applied
 YELLOW= Patch need reboot to be applied
 RED= Patch is not applied

This tweak will make Android Auto think that the car is at 0 speed. As a result, Android Auto will always show the preview of messages. This tweak does not apply to keyboard or first configuration of Android Auto.
This tweak will override the 6 tap limit of Android Auto and will make unlimited browsing of content always possible.

This tweak will unlock the new Assistant Shortcuts feature. Once activated you can go in Android Auto settings, and in the customize launcher section you can start adding shortcuts to Google Assistant commands

This tweak will override the default behaviour of Android Auto opening a navigation app at start and will make Android Auto start on launcher.
 This tweak could occasionally fail because sometimes Android Auto starts with a navigation to home or work autonomously. This behaviour breaks the tweak.
 In some cases this tweak will disable auto start of music. A known workaround is to disable and re-enable the option within Android Auto settings.
 IT'S NOT POSSIBLE TO SET A SPECIFIC APP TO START FIRST.
This tweak will force Android Auto in widescreen mode.
This tweak will force Android Auto in no widescreen mode.
This tweak enable an animation of Google Assistant in the navigation bar.
This tweak will make the status bar always black.
This tweak will prevent the battery icon with the red outline when battery saver is on.
This tweak let you set a custom duration for heads up notifications
This tweak let you set a custom duration for media notifications in navigation bar to up to 15 minutes.
BETA This tweak should prevent Bluetooth from turning on when Android Auto is connected. This tweak won\'t work if Bluetooth is already on, and currently it is in beta.

This tweak will enable third-party apps made specifically with Android Auto custom SDK to work on Android Auto.\n If you are familiar with AA Phenotype Patcher, this tweak is pretty much identical to it.\n It\'s not possible to add just any app to Android Auto, but it\'s possible to patch sideloaded apps MADE FOR ANDROID AUTO to work in cars.

This is an hidden feature inside Android Auto that will turn the second space in widescreen mode to a real second display that is completely taken by a seond activity. Google Maps will display a full map with navigation status, music and phones will take the full space.
 Additionally, this mode activates another feature that will turn the phone's screen in a second display for navigation in Android Auto.
 Settings for tweaking this feature will be available in Android Auto homescreen.
 Apparently, only Google Maps currently support this mode.
 This feature is probably under development and could potentially not work as intended.
 Android Auto 5.8 or superior is required.
This tweak will prevent Android Auto from giving popup warnings when battery saver mode is on
Force widescreen has been automatically disabled
Force disable widescreen has been automatically disabled
